meanings.definition: The action or process of manufacturing or inventing something.
meanings.sent1: The fabrication of the toy was done with care and precision.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in the fabrication of custom furniture.
meanings.sent3: His claim of being a ninja was a fabrication to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: The fabrication of dreams in his mind led to great inventions.
meanings.sent5: The fabrication of the spaceship was a monumental achievement in engineering.

meanings.sent1: She knew his story was a fabrication to avoid trouble.
meanings.sent2: The fabrication about his whereabouts quickly unraveled under scrutiny.
meanings.sent3: His fabrication about having a pet dragon was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The fabrication of excuses only made the situation worse.
meanings.sent5: The fabrication of the lost treasure map led them on a wild goose chase.
